categories: Category:Military officers of Revan's Sith Empire

nodes.text: Duan was a female Human officer who served Darth Malak's Sith Empire during the Jedi Civil War. In 3956 BBY, she was stationed on Manaan. During her stay, she was known to be a heavy drinker.
Duan will only have a conversation if Revan is a male. If Revan is a woman, Duan simply tells the female Revan to back-off and leave her alone.
